rulings.text: Only names of actual creature cards can be used. For example, Wandering Fumarole cannot be named even if a Wandering Fumarole on the battlefield is currently a creature. At the time of this ruling, the only such tokens other than token copies are Assembly-Worker, Cloud Sprite, Festering Goblin, Goldmeadow Harrier, Kobolds of Kher Keep, Llanowar Elves, Metallic Sliver, Nightmare, Shapeshifter, and Spark Elemental.
